content:
SystemNodeRepairAction.FullReimage Field

Definition

Namespace:
System.Fabric.Repair
Assembly:
System.Fabric.dll

In this Article

Reimages all disk volumes of the target nodes, destroying all data stored on the nodes.

FullReimage
Returns
SystemNodeRepairAction

To be added.
